description: V1 Sports Application for Android Phones and Tablets.#1 Worldwide Sports Video Analysis SoftwareWhether playing or practicing, users can conveniently record and analyze their athletic motion and identifytheir flaws on the spot. The V1 Sports App includes a variety of model videos from differentsports like squash, tennis, football, bowling, soccer, karate, basketball and gymnastics to compare yourvideos to.CAPTURE (in HD):*Trim, Edit Video*Playback in Slow-mo, frame-by-frameCOMPARE:*Split-Screen Motion Analysis *Flip/Mirror, Zoom, Overlay Videos*Landscape or Vertical Orientation*Professional Library for comparisons*Full Suite of Analysis Tools IMPROVE:*Create free online “locker” to store videos*Submit/View Analyzed Clips from V1 Instructor*Email Screenshot of analysis*Email Video to a friend or Pro*Access to Drills/Tips from V1 instructors*View V1 Sports YouTube Channel for more tips *****************About Interactive FrontiersInteractive Frontiers is the maker of V1 Pro, the #1 Video Analysis Software in Sports. descriptionHTML:
V1 Sports Application for Android Phones and Tablets.
#1 Worldwide Sports Video Analysis Software

Whether playing or practicing, users can conveniently record and analyze their athletic motion and identify
their flaws on the spot. V1 Sports App includes a free personal online locker and features a suite of drawing
tools, video trim, playback options and more!
————————————————————

~APP HIGHLIGHTS~

Compare your motion to the Pros. The V1 Sports App includes a variety of model videos from different
sports like squash, tennis, football, bowling, soccer, karate, basketball and gymnastics to compare your
videos to.

CAPTURE (in HD):
*Trim, Edit Video
*Playback in Slow-mo, frame-by-frame

COMPARE:
*Split-Screen Motion Analysis 
*Flip/Mirror, Zoom, Overlay Videos
*Landscape or Vertical Orientation
*Professional Library for comparisons
*Full Suite of Analysis Tools 

IMPROVE:
*Create free online “locker” to store videos
*Submit/View Analyzed Clips from V1 Instructor
*Email Screenshot of analysis
*Email Video to a friend or Pro
*Access to Drills/Tips from V1 instructors
*View V1 Sports YouTube Channel for more tips 
*****************

About Interactive Frontiers

Interactive Frontiers is the maker of V1 Pro, the #1 Video Analysis Software in Sports. V1 Pro is the
preferred technology partner of PGA.com, PGA of America, IMG Sports, Golf Digest and used by leading
professionals and instructors worldwide to capture, analyze and improve their athletic motion. The V1 Sports
app is built from this leading technology gained from over 15 years of ongoing research and development in

We are committed to continually improving the V1 Sports App, so we encourage any/all feedback you may
want to offer.

~For more information about Interactive Frontiers and the V1 Sports App, please visit www.v1sports.com~
comments: Unable to open video Importing videos from Pixel XL not working as well as capturing video from app. Error message after trimming is "unable to open video"

Can't log in I used my Facebook to sign in. And then it kept telling me error messages or network connection fail. Despite the fact that I am connected to the network and haven't changed any settings on my Facebook account. They need to look into this.
